docs.lead_paragraph: An intensive antinarcotics campaign aimed at vulnerable "young kids who are not hooked" was disclosed yesterday at City Hall by Mayor Lindsay.
docs.abstract: 4 men charged with having distributed counterfeit hair conditioner and with having tried to coerce Wella Corp, NJ, mfr of genuine product, to pay them for ceasing to sell fake conditioner; 4th man is still being sought
docs.snippet: An intensive antinarcotics campaign aimed at vulnerable "young kids who are not hooked" was disclosed yesterday at City Hall by Mayor Lindsay.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 28 -- The Food and Drug Administration made public today for the first time a master list of food contamination limits that puts ceilings on such things as rodent hairs in peanut butter and from fly eggs in tomato juice.

headline.main: LIMITS ARE POSTED ON DIRT IN FOODS; F.D.A. Makes Public a List of Contaminant Ceilings

docs.abstract: FDA makes public for 1st time master list of food contamination limits that puts ceilings on amt of filth that may be tolerated in food; limits for some foods detailed
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 28 -- The Food and Drug Administration made public today for the first time a master list of food contamination limits that puts ceilings on such things as rodent hairs in peanut butter and from fly eggs in tomato juice.

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr.Special to The New York Times
